trans-unit.source: Encapsulates and propagates all security-related data for execution contexts transferred across threads.
This class cannot be inherited.

A <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> object captures all security-related information for a logical thread, including the information contained in the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> and <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> objeto captura todas as informações relacionadas à segurança para um segmento lógico, incluindo as informações contidas no <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> e <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This configuration allows the Windows identity and the security elements on the stack to be propagated automatically when the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> is copied and transferred across asynchronous threads.
trans-unit.target: Essa configuração permite que a identidade do Windows e os elementos de segurança na pilha sejam propagadas automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> é copiado e transferidos entre threads assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions.
trans-unit.target: O common language runtime (CLR) está ciente das operações executadas usando somente código gerenciado, não de representação executada fora do código gerenciado, como por meio da plataforma chamar código não gerenciado ou por meio de chamadas diretas para funções do Win32 de representação.

trans-unit.source: Only managed <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (`<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy enabled="true"/>`).
trans-unit.target: Somente gerenciado <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objetos possam fluir entre pontos assíncronos, a menos que o `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` elemento foi definido como `true` (`<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy enabled="true"/>`).

trans-unit.source: Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` elemento `true` Especifica que a identidade do Windows sempre flui pelos pontos assíncronos, independentemente de como a representação foi executada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o fluxo não gerenciado a representação pelos pontos assíncronos, consulte [ <alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> elemento](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> is part of the larger <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> and flows or migrates when the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> flows or migrates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> é parte do maior <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> e fluxos ou migra quando o <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> fluxos ou migra.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Quando você terminar de usar o tipo, descarte-direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Para descartar o tipo diretamente, chame seu <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> método em um `try` / `catch` bloco.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Para descartar indiretamente dele, use uma construção de linguagem, como `using` (em c#) ou `Using` (no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a seção "Usando um objeto que implementa IDisposable" o <xref:System.IDisposable> tópico de interface.

trans-unit.source: Captures the security context for the current thread.
The security context for the current thread.
The captured security context can be applied to another thread.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de segurança capturada pode ser aplicado a outro thread.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> consists of the <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack> and the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> for the executing thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> consiste de <xref:System.Threading.CompressedStack> e <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> para a execução do thread.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current security context.
The security context for the current thread.
The current context must have been acquired through a capture or a copy operation.
trans-unit.target: O contexto atual deve ter sido adquirido por meio de uma captura ou de uma operação de cópia.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for applying a captured <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> to multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil para aplicar um capturada <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> em vários threads.

trans-unit.source: The current security context has been previously used, was marshaled across application domains, or was not acquired through the <see cref="M:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture" /> method.
Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityContext" /> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O `Dispose` método deixa o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar `Dispose`, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar `Dispose` antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the flow of the security context has been suppressed.
<see langword="true" /> if the flow has been suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.IsFlowSuppressed%2A> method is used by infrastructure components to determine whether to transfer the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> information during asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.IsFlowSuppressed%2A> método é usado pelos componentes de infraestrutura para determinar se é preciso transferir a <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> informações durante as operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the flow of the Windows identity portion of the current security context has been suppressed.
<see langword="true" /> if the flow has been suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.IsWindowsIdentityFlowSuppressed%2A> method is used by infrastructure components to determine whether to transfer the Windows identity information when the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> migrates during asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.IsWindowsIdentityFlowSuppressed%2A> método é usado pelos componentes de infraestrutura para determinar se deseja transferir as informações de identidade do Windows quando o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> migra durante operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Restores the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.

The <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.RestoreFlow%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to reverse the effect of a prior <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.SuppressFlow%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.RestoreFlow%2A> método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para reverter o efeito de um anterior <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.SuppressFlow%2A> chamada de método.

trans-unit.source: The security context is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
The security context to set.
The delegate that represents the method to run in the specified security context.
The object to pass to the callback method.
Runs the specified method in the specified security context on the current thread.
The security context for the current thread is returned to its previous state when the method call is complete.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de segurança para o segmento atual é retornado para seu estado anterior quando a chamada do método está concluída.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Run%2A> method to execute a method in a specified security context.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Run%2A> método para executar um método em um contexto de segurança especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="securityContext" /> was not acquired through a capture operation.
-or-

<paramref name="securityContext" /> has already been used as the argument to a <see cref="M:System.Security.SecurityContext.Run(System.Security.SecurityContext,System.Threading.ContextCallback,System.Object)" /> method call.
requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.
An <see cref="T:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl" /> structure for restoring the flow.
Use this method to suppress the flow of <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> information on the current thread for asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para suprimir o fluxo de <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> informações sobre o thread atual para operações assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) is only aware of the impersonation operations performed using managed code.
trans-unit.target: O common language runtime (CLR) só está ciente das operações de representação executadas usando código gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: The CLR has no knowledge of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as platform invokes to unmanaged code that does the impersonation, or through calls to Win32 functions.
trans-unit.target: O CLR não tem conhecimento de representação executada fora do código gerenciado, como a plataforma invoca para código não gerenciado que faz a representação, ou por meio de chamadas a funções do Win32.

trans-unit.source: To flow identity across asynchronous points you must use the managed <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> and <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> methods.
trans-unit.target: A identidade de fluxo nos pontos de assíncronas, você deve usar o gerenciado <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> e <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure to return the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> object to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> método retornado <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> estrutura para retornar o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> objeto para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected with a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure?displayProperty=nameWithType> permission.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é protegido com uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType> para <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure?displayProperty=nameWithType> permissão.

trans-unit.source: A fully trusted component can call this method to suppress the flow of the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> information during asynchronous calls.
trans-unit.target: Um componente totalmente confiável pode chamar esse método para suprimir o fluxo do <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> informações durante chamadas assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: When the flow is suppressed, the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture%2A> method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o fluxo é suprimido, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext.Capture%2A> método retornará `null`.

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.

trans-unit.source: Suppresses the flow of the Windows identity portion of the current security context across asynchronous threads.
A structure for restoring the flow.
Use this method to suppress the flow of the Windows identity when the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> migrates across asynchronous threads.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para suprimir o fluxo da identidade do Windows quando o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> migra entre threads assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure to return the <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> object to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> método retornado <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> estrutura para retornar o <xref:System.Security.SecurityContext> objeto para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions.
trans-unit.target: O common language runtime (CLR) está ciente das operações executadas usando somente código gerenciado, não de representação executada fora do código gerenciado, como por meio da plataforma chamar código não gerenciado ou por meio de chamadas diretas para funções do Win32 de representação.

trans-unit.source: Only managed <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (`<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy enabled="true"/>`).
trans-unit.target: Somente gerenciado <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objetos possam fluir entre pontos assíncronos, a menos que o `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` elemento foi definido como `true` (`<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy enabled="true"/>`).

trans-unit.source: Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` elemento `true` Especifica que a identidade do Windows sempre flui pelos pontos assíncronos, independentemente de como a representação foi executada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [\<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o fluxo não gerenciado a representação pelos pontos assíncronos, consulte [ \<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy > elemento](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: requer confiança total para o chamador imediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código transparente ou parcialmente confiável.
